item.title: Azerbaijan Airlines plane crashes in Kazakhstan, many feared dead
item.description: A passenger plane crashed near the city of Aktau in Kazakhstan on Wednesday and initial reports suggested there were survivors.

item.title: Hundreds of American Airlines flights delayed after glitch briefly grounded planes
item.description: American Airlines briefly grounds flights nationwide citing a technical glitch.

item.title: S&P 500 rises 1% on Christmas Eve, tech stocks lift the market again: Live updates
item.description: Tuesday marked the start of the seasonal Santa Claus rally, which happens in the last five trading days of the year and the first two in January.
